# A dedicated wildlife ecologist and geospatial scientist...

Hello, my name is Ben Tjepkes and this is my online portfolio showcasing my professional and creative projects. I am a graduate student at the University of Missouri in the Department of Geography where I use a variety of data science and geospatial tools to conduct research in wildlife ecology and biogeography. Please have a look around and thank you for stopping by!

:::

## My Geographic Perspective

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| column: page
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(sf)

sites <- sf::st_read("research/features_for_website.geojson", quiet = TRUE)

points_edu <- sf::st_read("curriculum-vitae/features-for-cv-WGS84.geojson", quiet = TRUE) |> 
  dplyr::filter(EntityType == "Education")

points_exp <- sf::st_read("curriculum-vitae/features-for-cv-WGS84.geojson", quiet = TRUE) |> 
  dplyr::filter(EntityType == "Work Experience")

bbox <- sf::st_bbox(sites)

leaflet(sites, options = leafletOptions(minZoom = 5, maxZoom = 8, scrollWheelZoom = FALSE)) |> 
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap.HOT) |> 
  addPolygons(label = ~as.character(Name),
              labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = FALSE,
                                          direction = "bottom"),
              color = "red",
              group = "Research Sites") |> 
  
  addCircleMarkers(data = points_edu,
             label = ~as.character(Entity),
             group = "Colleges/Universities",
             fillColor = "blue") |> 
  
    addCircleMarkers(data = points_exp,
             label = ~as.character(Entity),
             group = "Work/Experience",
             radius = 4,
             fillColor = "orange",
             fillOpacity = 1,
             color = "darkorange") |> 
  
  setMaxBounds(lng1 = -125.69159, lat1 = 24.33702,
               lng2 = -63.43924, lat2 = 50.50496) |> 
  addLegend(position = "bottomleft",
            colors = c("red", "blue", "orange"),
            labels = c("Research Sites", "Colleges/Universities", "Work/Experience")) |>
  
  addLayersControl(overlayGroups = c("Research Sites", "Colleges/Universities", "Work/Experience"),
                   options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE)) |> 
  addFullscreenControl()
```
